'''Perfectly-Drawn Focus''' is an indoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Lynette]], [[Lyney]] and [[Arlecchino]]

The blueprint is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
